snippet: A former crime laboratory analyst resigned Monday and was arrested Tuesday on charges of stealing and selling drugs he was supposed to be testing.
abstract: Joseph Graves, former analyst for Florida's Dept of Law Enforcement crime laboratory in Pensacola, resigns and is arrested on charges of stealing and selling narcotic painkillers he was supposed to be testing.
lead_paragraph: A former crime laboratory analyst resigned Monday and was arrested Tuesday on charges of stealing and selling drugs he was supposed to be testing.

headline.main: Florida: Arrested Lab Analyst Details Back Ailment
headline.print_headline: Florida: Arrested Lab Analyst Details Back Ailment
